attributes.action: allow local mp's more power over local authorites
attributes.additional_details: id like parliment to give more power and control to local mp's to help govern local authority policy and procedures around asb/and housing banding as a result of asb being inflicted on residents.. giving the local mp's final say on how cases are resolved within complaint procedures..as present procedures and policies are not effective
attributes.background: local mp's need more power over local authorites to ensure enforcement of policies and procedures/asb prevention and housing policy and banding as a result of asb

rejection.details:
Petitions need to call on the Government or Parliament to take a specific action. 

We're not sure exactly what power you would like MPs to have. 

You could start a new petition explaining clearly what you would like the Government or Parliament to do.
